DOC.brief_summary: In previous vitro study could show , Dexpanthenol influence gene expression fibroblast . The gene influence Dexpanthenol play mainly role cell proliferate processes.The aim study investigate molecular effect Dexpanthenol human live skin , wound healing .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Molecular Level Influence 5 % Dexpanthenol Ointment Subjects With Superficial Injuries
DOC.criteria: Skin type I IV Willingness avoid intensive sunlight exposure two week start study least 2 month removal stitch Active skin disease , mole , tattoo , strong pigmentation test area scar test area would influence visual score History keloid hypertrophic scar Frequent visit tan booth Intake drug interfere immune system ( e.g . antiphlogistics , corticosteroid , immunosuppressant , antihistamine ) within 30 day day 1 well study .
